title: This righteous bot trolls hypocritical brands posting about International Women’s Day
content:
It’s that time of year again: inspiration porn is everywhere, image libraries are seeing huge downloads of diverse females in suits, and women are organizing their own celebrations without pay. Yes, it’s International Women’s Day. But what happens when we look behind the sickly efforts of corporations? The back-patting social media posts? The tokenization? Well, you’ll find a fucking huge gender pay gap. Introducing… the Gender Pay Gap Bot The Gender Pay Gap Bot Today some anonymous activists launched a campaign on Twitter to raise awareness about the gender pay gap. It explains: Employers, if you tweet about International Women‘s Day, I’ll…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: On International Women's Day a gender pay gap bot calls out companies using social media to promote gender inclusion for their wage disparity.
